amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Public Housing Capital Fund by $30 million for use by the HOPE VI housing program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Public Housing Capital Fund Program by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (AL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 162 (Roll no. 268).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Davis (AL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
